pr_title: Fix using default context storage implemenation in LazyStorage

timeline.message: Fix using default context storage implemenation in LazyStorage
Use the single implementation if providerClassName property is unset

timeline.bodyText:
@dengliming Sorry if my suggestions weren't clear, thanks for bearing with me. We have these success cases

1 provider, providerClassName empty - returns the 1 provider
1 provider, providerClassName matches the provider - returns the 1 provider <- currently missing
multiple providers, providerClassName matches one of them - returns the provider that matches

Otherwise log an error message and return default storage
Hope this makes it clear
timeline.author: anuraaga
